member.name: T:Csv.CsvOptions
member.summary: Defines the options that can be passed to customize the reading or writing of csv files.

member.name: P:Csv.CsvOptions.RowsToSkip
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of rows to skip before reading the header row, defaults to 0.

member.name: P:Csv.CsvOptions.SkipRow
member.summary: Gets or sets a function to skip the current row based on its raw string value or 1-based index. Skips empty rows and rows starting with # by default.

member.name: P:Csv.CsvOptions.Separator
member.summary: Gets or sets the character to use for separating data, defaults to '\0' which will auto-detect from the header row.

member.name: P:Csv.CsvOptions.TrimData
member.summary: Gets or sets wether data should be trimmed when accessed.

member.name: P:Csv.CsvOptions.Comparer
member.summary: Gets or sets the comparer to use when looking up header names.

member.name: P:Csv.CsvOptions.HeaderMode
member.summary: Gets or sets an indicator to the parser to expect a header row or not.

member.name: P:Csv.CsvOptions.ValidateColumnCount
member.summary: Gets or sets wether a row should be validated immediately that the column count matches the header count.

member.name: T:Csv.CsvReader
member.summary: Helper class to read csv (comma separated values) data.

member.name: M:Csv.CsvReader.Read(System.IO.TextReader,Csv.CsvOptions)
member.summary: Reads the lines from the reader.
member.param: The text reader to read the data from.
The optional options to use when reading.

member.name: M:Csv.CsvReader.ReadFromStream(System.IO.Stream,Csv.CsvOptions)
member.summary: Reads the lines from the stream.
member.param: The stream to read the data from.
The optional options to use when reading.

member.name: M:Csv.CsvReader.ReadFromText(System.String,Csv.CsvOptions)
member.summary: Reads the lines from the csv string.
member.param: The csv string to read the data from.
The optional options to use when reading.

member.name: T:Csv.HeaderMode
member.summary: Indicates the presence or absence of a header row

member.name: F:Csv.HeaderMode.HeaderPresent
member.summary: Indicates that the CSV file has a header row

member.name: F:Csv.HeaderMode.HeaderAbsent
member.summary: Indicates that the CSV file does not have a header row

member.name: T:Csv.ICsvLine
member.summary: Represents a single data line inside a csv file.

member.name: P:Csv.ICsvLine.Headers
member.summary: Gets the headers from the csv file.

member.name: P:Csv.ICsvLine.Raw
member.summary: Gets the original raw content of the line.

member.name: P:Csv.ICsvLine.Index
member.summary: Gets the 1-based index for the line inside the file.

member.name: P:Csv.ICsvLine.ColumnCount
member.summary: Gets the number of columns of the line.

member.name: P:Csv.ICsvLine.Item(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the data for the specified named header.

member.name: P:Csv.ICsvLine.Item(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the data for the specified indexed header.
